song_lyrics: Ho rangīle Shyām re, tum meram ho mere,
Mai bandī prītam tam sandī, hāth bekānī tere... Ho° 1
Jog yagna tīrath bartādik, devī dev ghanere,
Īnse kāj sare nahī kabahu, e sab māyā kere... Ho° 2
Aur ṭhor man bhrame nahī mero, charaṇ kamal chitta ṭhere,
Brahmānand kahe man Mohan, raho mere ankhiyan nere... Ho° 3
title: Ho rangīle Shyām re tum meram ho mere

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-657: Sadguru Brahmanand Swami

Category: Prapti ne Mahimana Pad
